It's important to maintain a balanced diet and limit your intake of sugary foods and drinks. Instead, opt for nutrient-dense options like fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats. Remember, a balanced diet is key to maintaining good health! *smiling face*" "È importante tenere sotto controllo l'assunzione di zuccheri e dolci nella dieta
